summary: Lydia as a first part of my new mod. Now she can change into werewolf and belong to Companion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/10812-1-1329920598.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/4457/descriptione.jpg[/img]
[b][color=lightblue]Hello again.[/color][/b]
Now only Lydia. What next? You tell me. I will be making changing into females npc for your\'s request\'s.

Lydia now will change into Werewolf if you can do it. And she have female animation (Now she is more like a woman, but still brave warrior ; ))
And propably she will be going to train to companion training place (im working on it still). I have changed her armor to Rusted Iron. But i can change it to whatever you like, she can be neaked as default if you ask me. So, enjoy you new looking female companion.

I will change her name into Lydia Falcon, becose its seems to mach her now. I consider of Lydia Hawk or Lydia White Crow. But i have not decided yet. 

And tell me if you like her or what to change. 

[b][color=lightblue]!And you will need this:![/color][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=515]Cute Freckles[/url]

To make your\'s Lydia thats wonderfull Freckles like on image. 

Sorry for my dark image, but i rly like this style. 

Im also fan of Vampire: Masquarade and whole of World Of Darkness book\'s. So don\'t be angry for me changing companion into Vampire or Werewolfs. (Like Marcurio) I promiss i will be doing 2 version of them ; ) 

Im not a man, so i dont know what exacly you will like. But i have my girl type, maybe this will satisfact you. I dont know. Epic Female Companion Compilation is coming, so be prepared! 

[color=lightblue][b]My Other mod\'s[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10256]Epic Companion Compilation[/url]


[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/9748/changelogo.jpg[/img]
[b]Version 0.1[/b]
WIP version with only Lydia.

[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]


[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/6610/howtoinstall.jpg[/img]
1. Download by NMM
2. Fallow steps
3. Remember to choose only one version for double companion! For example: if you choos Vilkas, dont pick up Vilkas with Long Hair! Or when you pick up Calder, do not match Vampiric Calder!

Or:
1. Download newest version of mod.
2. Ignor fomod file.
3. Put you choice esp. file in to \\Skyrim\\Data folder
4. Start Skyrim Launcher and make sure to set esp files as active
5. Enjoy you new companion.

[b]IMPORTANT[/b]
This mod is incompatibile with any other mod that change .esp file for this companion!
Before you install this version make sure that you have unistalled older version!

[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/870/futureplant.jpg[/img]
Vilkas with warpaint version (2 wariants)
Farkas with warpaint version (2 wariant)
Female Better Look for all man. 
Ulfric and Brynjolf better look. 
Totaly new female companion. 


[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/425/creditsqj.jpg[/img]

- Bellyaches for providing me to right track in editing NMM installation. Without her help i would never figured this out!

- Zhoken for making such a wonderfull looking freckles. And i hghly recomend his mod to take result as i have on image. 

- Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the whole TES series. And for giving us tool like CK to make theyr game better!
[/center]
author: Gnatozuj
